title: Radiation Protection Eng
description: Covers radiation dosimetry, biological effects of radiation, radiation-protection criteria and exposure limits, external radiation protection, internal radiation protection, and sources of human exposure.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (MATH 2403 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2413 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 24X3 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2562 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 2X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and NRE 3301 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
